title: Does anyone know how to activate visual voicemail pixel 3a? I never know if I have voicemail?
content: Can't activate visual voicemail. Does anyone know how to fix it? I don't get notified when I have voicemail and then I can't get visual voicemail either. It's frustrating I had no problem with this on my last 2 pixel phones. Can anyone help md figure out either of these issues? Thank you.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
